Summary: metallic disc shaped object with white dome seen in North Houston
divs: sighting detailsi was in the neighbors side yard with grandchildren, noticed a silvery\white object in the sky. i at first thought that it was a large white crane which we sometimes see but i watched the object for a sec. then realized it's shape..... the object appeared to be aprox. 24 inches in diameter with a white dome. it was moving along a perfectly straight line heading south towards downtown houston. it made absolutely no sound at all and continued across the sky at a medium speed. it was not moving fast. i was aprox. fifty feet from a grove of trees where i lost sight of it. i ran to a clearing in the driveway and looked in the direction it was traveling but saw nothing! i was the only person to see it. i first had asked..."what is that?" ....then strained my eyes in disbelief as the full realization hit me.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around October 31st 2010
